Package com.halseyburgund.rwframework.core

Interface Summary
RWRecordingTask.StateListener Listener interface for callbacks during recording
 

Class Summary
RW Constants used in the Roundware RWFramework.
RWAction Class that represents an Action, which is a unit of communication with the Roundware server.
RWActionFactory Factory for creating standard RWAction instances based on the Roundware 2.0 protocol.
RWActionQueue Queue of Action items, provided as access to a local database.
RWConfiguration Project configuration parameters.
RWDbAdapter Database for storing Roundware action items.
RWHttpManager General HTTP data transfer handler.
RWLocationTracker Singleton class providing GPS/Location functionality.
RWRecordingTask Asynchronous task that handles creating an audio recording, suitable for use with Roundware.
RWService Service for background playback of Roundware sound stream and handle the various server calls.
RWTags Project tags data.
 

Enum Summary
RWService.SessionState Connection states of the Roundware session.
